title: Please can I come tomorrow? (TEFC)
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Education - Great Britain
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Education of children
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Infants - Development
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Infants - Development
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Education of children

description: A child is not born with a comprehension of miracles. Education should be tailored to his level of comprehension - his experiences with play and people. This film examines nursery school in some depth to see how a child in particular and society as a whole can benefit from them.
